info.title: Meadow Open API
info.description: The API to connect to the Meadow platform

get.description: Retrieve all incoming transfers from a compliance system (metrc) for an organization in reverse chronological order. 50 transfers will be returned at a time and may be paginated using the `startingAfter` query parameter.

parameters.name: startingAfter
parameters.description: The `id` for a transfer that you want to retrieve all transfers after this one. Pass in the last `id` in a response to retrieve the next page.

id.description: The ID of the compliance transfer

externalId.description: The ID of the transfer in the compliance system (metrc)

type.description: The compliance system this transfer came from

manifestNumber.description: The manifest number of the transfer in the compliance system

shipperLicenseNumber.description: The state license number of the shipper

createdAt.description: When this transfer was imported into Meadow

id.description: The id for this package

type.description: The compliance system this package is from

externalId.description: The ID of this package in the compliance system

externalProductName.description: The name of the product for this package in the compliance system

label.description: The unique identifier for this package

status.description:
The status of the package.

- `ready` - The package has not been associated with a product in Meadow
- `received` - Active inventory associated with a product and possibly a product option
- `finished` - The package has 0 inventory and is not sellable.
- `shipped` - This package has currently been shipped away from this licensee
- `transferred` - This package has been sent and is in possession of another licensee
- `transfer-returned` - This package has been transferred back, but has not been received into inventory yet

initialAmount.description: The amount this package contained when first transferred

unit.description: The unit of the package from the compliance system

createdAt.description: The datetime this package was created

onHold.description: Whether this package is currently on administrative hold

tradeSample.description: Whether this package is a trade sample

product.description: The product this package has been associated with in Meadow or `null` if not associated yet

id.description: The ID of the product

name.description: The name of the product in Meadow

archivedAt.description: A datetime for when this product was archived or `null` if it is not archived

deletedAt.description: A datetime for when this product was deleted or `null` if it is not deleted

productOption.description: The product option this package has been associated with in Meadow or `null` if not associated with one.

id.description: The ID of the product option

name.description: The name of the product option in Meadow

amount.description: The amount of the underlying unit of this product

price.description: The price in cents of this option

salesPrice.description: The sales price if one exists

upc.description: The UPC code for this option

deletedAt.description: A datetime for when this product option was deleted or `null` if it is not deleted

get.description: Retrieve all customer groups for an organization.

put.description: Add customer to a customer group

parameters.name: customerGroupId
parameters.description: ID of the customer group to add this customer to

emailOrPhone.description: Either an email address or a phone number of the customer to add to the group

put.description: Remove customer from a customer group

parameters.name: customerGroupId
parameters.description: ID of the customer group to remove this customer from

emailOrPhone.description: Either an email address or a phone number of the customer to remove from the group

get.description: Retrieve all customers for an organization in reverse chronological order. 50 customers will be returned at a time and may be paginated using the `startingAfter` query parameter.

parameters.name: startingAfter
parameters.description: The `id` for a customer that you want to retrieve all customers after this one. Pass in the last `id` in a response to retrieve the next page.

parameters.name: startingOn
parameters.description: A date that must be formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`. When submitted, the response will return the latest customer on that day and continue in reverse chronological order. I.E. if `2022-11-25` is passed in, the first customer will be as close to 11:59pm November 25th, 2022 as possible.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Accepts a single value of `updatedAt` if you would like the customers list to be sorted by when each customer was last updated in reverse chronological order (i.e. most recently updated first). Example on how to use: `?sortBy=updatedAt`

get.description: Retrieve details for a specific customer via ID

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: ID of customer to retrieve

get.description: Retrieves the status of the order for that ID

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of order to retrieve

id.description: The ID of the order

status.description:
The status of the order. One of `draft`, `new`, `packed`, `fulfilled`, `canceled`

- `draft` is an order submitted without inventory taken out
- `new` is an order that has had inventory associated with it
- `packed` signifies an order has been processed and is waiting for pickup/delivery
- `fulfilled` is an order that has been fully completed
- `canceled` is an order that has been canceled

post.description: Retrieve pricing information for a cart (prices, discounts, taxes, etc.)

lineItems.description: An array of products to buy

productOptionId.description: The ID from the [menu api response](/endpoints/menu/list-menu) `data[].options[].id`

quantity.description: The quantity of this product option to purchase

customer.description: The customer for this order. This object is optional, but if provided, must have a `firstName`, `lastName` and either an `email` or `phone`.

firstName.description: The first name of the customer

lastName.description: The last name of the customer. Multiple last names may be separated by a space.

email.description: The email of the customer. At least one of email, phone must be provided.

phone.description: The phone of the customer. At least one of email, phone must be provided.

postalCode.description: The postal code for this order. This will take into account an organizationâ€™s order minimums

deliveryFee.description: A fee that will be passed through and added onto the `customerGrandTotal`

deliveryFeeDescription.description: A passthrough title for the delivery fee

lineItems.description: The line items of this cart

productOptionId.description: The product option ID for this line item

quantity.description: The quantity of this line item

unitPrice.description: The unit price for a single quantity of this line item

subtotalPrice.description: The total cost of all quantities of this line item before discounts

finalPrice.description: The final cost of this line item after discounts

discounts.description: An array of automatic discounts applied to this line item (may be empty)

amountUsed.description: The amount of the discount represented in cents.

description.description: The description of the discount, which may be shown to the customer

totalPrice.description: The subtotal price before discounts, credits, adjustments are taken into account.

netPrice.description: The final price of the order before payment & delivery fees.

customerGrandTotal.description: The cost of the order that the customer will pay

discounts.description: An array of order level discounts

amountUsed.description: The amount of the discount represented in cents

description.description: The description of the discount, which may be shown to the customer

credits.description: An array of credits applied. May be store credit or promo codes attached to the customers account.

amountUsed.description: The amount of the credit used represented in cents

description.description: The description of the credit, which may be shown to the customer

adjustments.description: An array of adjustments made to the order. May be a tax exemption or other future Meadow POS behavior.

amount.description: The amount of the adjustment represented in cents.

description.description: The description of the adjustment, which may be shown to the customer

taxes.description: All of the taxes that will be applied if an order is placed with this cart

amount.description: The amount of the tax represented in cents to show to the user

description.description: The description of the tax to show to the user

orderMinimum.description: The order minimum for this dispensary and postal code

metOrderMinimum.description: Whether this cart has met the order minimum or not

idempotencyKey.description: A string that should be used when creating an order to ensure idempotency and avoid double orders due to server miscommunication.

get.description: Retrieve all orders for an organization in reverse chronological order. 50 orders will be returned at a time and may be paginated using the `startingAfter` query parameter.

parameters.name: startingAfter
parameters.description: The `id` for an order that you want to retrieve all orders after this one. Pass in the last `id` in a response to retrieve the next page.

parameters.name: startingOn
parameters.description: A date that must be formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`. When submitted, the response will return the latest order on that day and continue in reverse chronological order. I.E. if `2022-11-25` is passed in, the first order will be as close to 11:59pm November 25th, 2022 as possible.

parameters.name: fulfilledOnly
parameters.description: When passed in as `true`, only fulfilled orders will be returned. The response will be ordered in reverse chronological order of fulfilled date. Also, this will cause `startingOn` to use `fulfilledAt` instead of `createdAt` for determining what orders to return.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Only orders of that type will be returned if this parameter is sent.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Retrieves orders by user. You can get user IDs from [List customers](/endpoints/customers/list-customers) or after [Creating an order](/endpoints/orders/create-order).

post.description: Create an order for a customer

type.description: Order type - must be either `delivery` or `pickup`

lineItems.description: An array of products to buy

productOptionId.description: The ID from the [menu api response](/endpoints/menu/list-menu) `data[].options[].id`

quantity.description: The quantity of this product option to purchase

firstName.description: The first name of the customer

lastName.description: The last name of the customer. Multiple last names may be separated by a space.

email.description: The email of the customer. At least one of email, phone must be provided.

phone.description: The phone of the customer. At least one of email, phone must be provided.

address.description: The address of the customer. Required if `type` is set to `delivery`

idempotencyKey.description: Key to help avoid double orders due to server miscommunication. Please see ["Idempotent Requests" section](#idempotency). Please use the string provided to you by theÂ [pricingÂ endpoint](/endpoints/orders/retrieve-pricing). This value must be a v4 UUID.

deliveryNotes.description: Optional notes field to help fulfill the order (Example: please call on delivery)

deliveryFee.description: A fee that will be passed through and added onto the `customerGrandTotal`

deliveryFeeDescription.description: A passthrough title for the delivery fee

discountCodes.description: An array of promo codes to redeem. These codes must already exist in the Meadow backend.

id.description: The ID for the order. Used to fetch status updates

status.description: The status of the order. Will be set to `draft` or `new` depending on the organization's settings.

totalPrice.description: The subtotal price before discounts, credits, adjustments are taken into account.

netPrice.description: The final price of the order before payment & delivery fees.

customerGrandTotal.description: The cost of the order that the customer will pay

lineItems.description: The line items with pricing information attached

productOptionId.description: The product option ID for this line item

quantity.description: The quantity of this line item

unitPrice.description: The unit price for a single quantity of this line item

subtotalPrice.description: The total cost of all quantities of this line item before discounts

finalPrice.description: The final cost of this line item after discounts

discounts.description: An array of automatic discounts applied to this line item (may be empty)

amountUsed.description: The amount of the discount represented in cents.

description.description: The description of the discount, which may be shown to the customer

discounts.description: An array of order level discounts

amountUsed.description: The amount of the discount represented in cents

description.description: The description of the discount, which may be shown to the customer

credits.description: An array of credits applied. May be store credit or promo codes attached to the customers account.

amountUsed.description: The amount of the credit used represented in cents

description.description: The description of the credit, which may be shown to the customer

adjustments.description: An array of adjustments made to the order. May be a tax exemption or other future Meadow POS behavior.

amount.description: The amount of the adjustment represented in cents.

description.description: The description of the adjustment, which may be shown to the customer

taxes.description: All of the taxes applied to this order

amount.description: The amount of the tax represented in cents to show to the user

description.description: The description of the tax to show to the user

customer.description: The matched customer for this order

id.description: The ID of the user in Meadow

fullName.description: The full name of the user

get.description: Retrieve information about a specific order

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of order to retrieve

get.description: Retrieve all order returns for an organization in reverse chronological order. 50 order returns will be returned at a time and may be paginated using the `startingAfter` query parameter.

parameters.name: startingAfter
parameters.description: The `id` for an order return that you want to retrieve all order returns after this one. Pass in the last `id` in a response to retrieve the next page.

parameters.name: voided
parameters.description: Pass in `true` if you would like to only receive voided returns. Voided returns are ones that were cancelled and are no longer considered valid.

post.description: Create a payment intent for an order payment

orderPaymentId.description: The ID of the order payment to create this intent for

source.description: Submit `e-commerce` if this is an online order or `retail` if it is taking place in a store.

id.description: The ID for the payment intent

organizationId.description: The organization ID for this payment intent

userId.description: The ID of the user this payment intent was created for

paymentIntentId.description: The ID of the payment type for this intent

amount.description: The amount of the payment intent before fees in cents

feeAmount.description: The amount of the fee in cents

strongholdId.description: The ID of the payment object in Stronghold's system

strongholdLink.description: The payment link that should be shown to the customer to complete the payment

get.description: Retrieve all payment types for an organization.
Retrieve waiting room information for the dispensary.
Retrieve basic information about the organization

id.description: The id for the organization

hasDelivery.description: Whether this organization accepts delivery orders

hasPickup.description: Whether this organization accepts pickup orders

state.description: The state this organization is located in

licenseNumber.description: The license number for this organization

taxesIncluded.description: Whether taxes are included in the price of products

tz.description: The timezone name of the organization. This value should be used to adjust UTC times found throughout the API

get.description: Retrieve all of the inventory locations for the organization. These may be cross referenced in other requests when you see `inventoryLocationId`.

id.description: The ID of the inventory location

name.description: The name of the inventory location

description.description: A description of the inventory location

get.description: Retrieve all product information for both active and inactive products

id.description: The ID of the product

thcAmount.description: The amount of THC in the product

thcAmountEach.description: The amount of THC per each of the product

cbdAmount.description: The amount of CBD in the product

cbdAmountEach.description: The amount of CBD per each of the product

description.description: A text description about the product

inventoryType.description: Either `option` or `product`. See above for clarification

isActive.description: Whether the product is active on menus or not

isFeatured.description: Whether the product is featured or not

movingAverageCostPerUnit.description: The moving average cost per unit for this product if this products `inventoryType` is product

locationInventory.description: The location inventory if this product's `inventoryType` is product

inventoryLocationId.description: The id for this inventory location

amount.description: The amount of inventory for this product

options.description: All of the pricing options for a product

id.description: The ID of this option

amount.description: The amount of the underlying unit of this product

price.description: The price in cents of this option

salesPrice.description: The sales price in cents if one exists

upc.description: The UPC code for this option

movingAverageCostPerUnit.description: The moving average cost per unit for this product option

locationInventory.description: The inventory by location for this product option. Will only have values if the product's `inventoryType` is set to `option`

inventoryLocationId.description: The id for this inventory location

amount.description: The amount of inventory for this option

maxQuantity.description: The maximum quantity of this product option that is purchasable

photos.description: All of the photos for a product

fullPath.description: The URL to use to display the photo

primaryCategory.description: The primary category of the product

name.description: The name of the primary category

meta.description: Additional information regarding products for this organization

categories.description: All of the primary categories for this organization

order.description: The organization can determine what order they would like the categories to be displayed to the customer, starting with 0

inventoryLocations.description: All the inventory locations for this dispensary

id.description: The id for this location. This can be used to match up with `locationInventory[].inventoryLocationId` elsewhere in the response

name.description: The name of the inventory location

data.name: 1:3 Releaf Soak
data.description:
This slow-release patch sticks to skin, offering pain relief through transdermal delivery of full-spectrum cannabinoids. With a quick and easy single application, you get up to 12 hours of relief for your whole body. This product has the potential for some intoxicating effects. Find the ratio that works best for your specific needs: the patch comes in several options from THC-rich to CBD-exclusive.

Available individually, each patch has 30mg cannabinoids.

get.description: Retrieve all purchase orders for an organization in reverse chronological order. 50 purchase orders will be returned at a time and may be paginated using the `startingAfter` query parameter.

parameters.name: startingAfter
parameters.description: The `id` for a purchase order that you want to retrieve all purchase orders after this one. Pass in the last `id` in a response to retrieve the next page.

id.description: The ID of the purchase order

notes.description: User entered notes for this purchase order

expectedAt.description: A date for when this purchase order is expected in `YYYY-MM-DD`

totalAmount.description: The total amount (quantity) of product on this purchase order

totalAmountReceived.description: The total amount (quantity) of product received on this purchase order

subtotal.description: The subtotal of the purchase order in cents

finalTotal.description: The final total of the purchase order in cents

caExciseTotal.description: The number for pre-2023 California excise of this purchase order in cents

shippingHandlingFeeExcise.description: The number for pre-2023 California excise of the shipping and handling fee

amountPaid.description: The amount paid for this purchase order in cents

amountOustanding.description: The amount still left to be paid in cents

createdAt.description: When this purchase order was created

vendor.description: Information about the loyalty of the customer (Can be `null`)

id.description: The id for this vendor

notes.description: User entered notes about this vendor

sellerPermitNumber.description: The license number for this vendor

lineItems.description: All of the line items for this purchase order

id.description: The id of this line item

amount.description: The amount (quantity) for the product in this line item

costPerUnit.description: The cost for each amount of this line item in dollars

subtotal.description: The subtotal for this line item in cents

finalTotal.description: The final total for this line item in cents

amountReceived.description: The amount that has been received thus far

caExcisePerUnit.description: The amount of pre-2023 California excise tax per unit in dollars

caExciseTotal.description: The total amount of pre-2023 California excise tax for this line item in cents

receptions.description: All of the receptions for this purchase order line item

inventoryLocationId.description: The id of the inventory location where this inventory was received

amount.description: The amount (quantity) of the reception

product.description: The product that this line item is for

id.description: The ID of the product

strainType.description: The strain type of the product

id.description: ID of the category

cannabisType.description:
One of the following values:
`non-concentrated` - Flower or other non-concentrated THC products
`concentrated` - Concentrated THC products (Example: Edibles, Concentrates)
`immature-plant` - Cannabis plants
`none` - This product does not contain cannabis
`mi-infused-solids` - Cannabis infused solids (only in Michigan) (Example: edibles)
`mi-infused-fluids` - Cannabis infused fluids (only in Michigan) (Example: drinks)
`edibles` - Edible product (only used in New Jersey & Massachusetts)

post.description: Create a purchase order in order to receive inventory

paymentTermsDueDate.description: If payment terms is custom then this field is required. Date formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD` for when payment is due.

externalInvoiceNumber.description: Use this to store a 3rd party ID for the PO

inventoryVendorId.description: The inventory vendor ID obtained from list or create PO. Alternatively you can use `inventoryVendor.name`

name.description: name of the vendor. We will match to an existing vendor or create with the below properties if it does not exist.

lineItems.description: The products for this purchase order

productId.description: The ID of the product to add to the purchase order

productOptionId.description:
The ID of the option that belongs to the product submitted as `productId`. This property is required if the product's `inventoryType` is set to `option`.

View more information in our [Inventory Guide](/guides/inventory)

amount.description: The number of units purchased. Submit as string to avoid floating point errors.

costPerUnit.description: The cost per unit in dollars. Submit as string to avoid floating point errors.

parameters.name: purchaseOrderId
parameters.description: ID of the purchase order to update

paymentTermsDueDate.description: If payment terms is custom then this field is required. Date formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD` for when payment is due.

externalInvoiceNumber.description: Use this to store a 3rd party ID for the PO

inventoryVendorId.description: The inventory vendor ID obtained from list or create PO. Alternatively you can use `inventoryVendor.name`

name.description: name of the vendor. We will match to an existing vendor or create with the below properties if it does not exist.

lineItems.description: The products for this purchase order, This endpoint will update/delete/create ALL of the line items for this purchase order. For that reason, any existing line items you would like to keep must have the id property submitted. Any existing line items, which are not submitted with this endpoint will be deleted.

id.description: If updating an existing line item pass the line item ID from the create, update or list purchase order endpoints.

productId.description: The ID of the product to add to the purchase order

productOptionId.description:
The ID of the option that belongs to the product submitted as `productId`. This property is required if the product's `inventoryType` is set to `option`.

View more information in our [Inventory Guide](/guides/inventory)

amount.description: The number of units purchased. Submit as string to avoid floating point errors.

costPerUnit.description: The cost per unit in dollars. Submit as string to avoid floating point errors.

get.description: Fetch the menu for an organization

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Request a menu for one of three types: `delivery`, `pickup` or `in-store`. If `type` is not passed in, the menu for `delivery` will be returned.

Each Meadow client essentially has three different menus. If you intend to support an order flow for more than one type, you should pull each menu by sending in this parameter.

id.description: The ID of the product

thcAmount.description: The amount of THC in the product

thcAmountEach.description: The amount of THC per each of the product

cbdAmount.description: The amount of CBD in the product

cbdAmountEach.description: The amount of CBD per each of the product

description.description: A text description about the product

isFeatured.description: Whether the product is featured or not

inStock.description: Whether there is at least one option of this product in stock currently

options.description: All of the pricing options for a product

id.description: The ID of this product option. This value will be used for placing orders

amount.description: The amount of the underlying unit of this product

price.description: The price in cents of this option

salesPrice.description: The sales price if one exists

upc.description: The UPC code for this option

maxQuantity.description: The maximum number that is purchaseable based on current inventory

photos.description: Array of the photos for a product

fullPath.description: The URL to use to display the photo

primaryCategory.description: The primary category of the product

name.description: The name of the primary category

subCategories.description: Array of the sub-categories for the product

data.name: 7 Pre-rolled Smokes
data.description:
7 pre-rolled smokes
0.5 grams each
3.5 grams total

name.description: The name of the product, excluding any brand names.

description.description: A description for the product shown on menus. (Supports markdown)

unit.description: Set to `gram` when this product is in a category which is weighed out (i.e. "Flowers"), otherwise set to `item`

strainType.description: The strain type of the cannabis product, `none` otherwise.

category.description: A category name from the [List categories endpoint](/endpoints/products/list-categories). Please note that different client organizations may customize category names, for example renaming "Flowers" to "Flower."

subCategories.description: A list of sub category names from the [List sub-categories endpoint](/endpoints/products/list-sub-categories), or a new sub category name. Pass an empty array `[]` to have no sub categories.

brandName.description: The brand of the product. Meadow will match this to an existing brand or create a new brand if it does not exist.

photos.description: URLs for the image to associate with this product. Meadow will download with a background job. Max photo size is 15MB.

options.description: The purchaseable options of this product

name.description: The optional name for this option. When name is not specified, it will show up on the menu as "1 item" or "3.5 grams" using the `amount` of the option and the `unit` of the product.

amount.description: The amount of the underlying unit of this product. When `inventoryType` is set to `product`, this will be how much inventory is taken out for each quantity of this option purchased. When `inventoryType` is set to `option`, this value is only used to describe the product on the menu. For example, 3.5 for an Eighth or 1 for a single vape cartridge.

price.description: The price of this option in cents.

salesPrice.description: The discounted sales price of this option in cents if one exists.

content.description:
The amount of cannabis content this option has based on the `cannabisType` field from the product category. Based on the `cannabisType` this value should be sent as a numeric string based on the following unit:

- `non-concentrated` - grams (g) 
- `concentrated` - milligrams (mg) 
 - `mi-infused-solids` - ounces (oz) 
 - `mi-infused-fluids` - fluid ounces (fl oz) 
 - `edibles` - milligrams (mg) 
 - `immature-plant` - plants (i.e. # of plants)

When the category's `cannabisType` is set to `none`, you do not need to send a value. For all other types, the values must be greater than 0.

upc.description: A UPC code for this option

thcAmount.description: The total amount of THC present in this product

thcAmountEach.description: The amount of THC per each unit of the product (i.e. 10mg per pre-roll in a pack of 15 pre-rolls)

thcAmountRangeLow.description: The low value of a range if this product has a range of THC value.

thcAmountRangeHigh.description: The high value of a range if this product has a range of THC value.

thcUnit.description: The unit for the THC values submitted. Must be specified if any of the THC amount fields are provided.

cbdAmount.description: The total amount of CBD present in this product

cbdAmountEach.description: The amount of CBD per each unit of the product (i.e. 10mg per pre-roll in a pack of 15 pre-rolls)

cbdAmountRangeLow.description: The low value of a range if this product has a range of CBD value.

cbdAmountRangeHigh.description: The high value of a range if this product has a range of CBD value.

cbdUnit.description: The unit for the CBD values submitted. Must be specified if any of the CBD amount fields are provided.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product to update

name.description: The name of the product, excluding any brand names.

description.description: A description for the product shown on menus. (Supports markdown)

unit.description: Set to `gram` when this product is in a category which is weighed out (i.e. "Flowers"), otherwise set to `item`

strainType.description: The strain type of the cannabis product, `none` otherwise.

category.description: A category name from the [List categories endpoint](/endpoints/products/list-categories). Please note that different client organizations may customize category names, for example renaming "Flowers" to "Flower."

subCategories.description: A list of sub category names from the [List sub-categories endpoint](/endpoints/products/list-sub-categories), or a new sub category name. Pass an empty array `[]` to have no sub categories.

brandName.description: The brand of the product. Meadow will match this to an existing brand or create a new brand if it does not exist.

photos.description: URLs for the image to associate with this product. Meadow will download with a background job. Max photo size is 15MB.

inventoryType.description: The inventory type of this product. Please see the [Inventory Guide](/guides/inventory) for more information.

deletedAt.description: Set to current ISO 8601 timestamp to delete product

thcAmount.description: The total amount of THC present in this product

thcAmountEach.description: The amount of THC per each unit of the product (i.e. 10mg per pre-roll in a pack of 15 pre-rolls)

thcAmountRangeLow.description: The low value of a range if this product has a range of THC value.

thcAmountRangeHigh.description: The high value of a range if this product has a range of THC value.

thcUnit.description: The unit for the THC values submitted. Must be specified if any of the THC amount fields are provided.

cbdAmount.description: The total amount of CBD present in this product

cbdAmountEach.description: The amount of CBD per each unit of the product (i.e. 10mg per pre-roll in a pack of 15 pre-rolls)

cbdAmountRangeLow.description: The low value of a range if this product has a range of CBD value.

cbdAmountRangeHigh.description: The high value of a range if this product has a range of CBD value.

cbdUnit.description: The unit for the CBD values submitted. Must be specified if any of the CBD amount fields are provided.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product to update

options.description: The purchaseable options of this product. This endpoint will update/delete/create ALL of the options for this product. For that reason, any existing options you would like to keep must have the `id` property submitted. Any existing options, which are not submitted with this endpoint will be deleted.

id.description: The ID of an existing option

name.description: The optional name for this option. When name is not specified, it will show up on the menu as "1 item" or "3.5 grams" using the `amount` of the option and the `unit` of the product.

amount.description: The amount of the underlying unit of this product. When `inventoryType` is set to `product`, this will be how much inventory is taken out for each quantity of this option purchased. When `inventoryType` is set to `option`, this value is only used to describe the product on the menu. For example, 3.5 for an Eighth or 1 for a single vape cartridge.

price.description: The price of this option in cents.

salesPrice.description: The discounted sales price of this option in cents if one exists.

content.description:
The amount of cannabis content this option has based on the `cannabisType` field from the product category. Based on the `cannabisType` this value should be sent as a numeric string based on the following unit:

- `non-concentrated` - grams (g) 
- `concentrated` - milligrams (mg) 
 - `mi-infused-solids` - ounces (oz) 
 - `mi-infused-fluids` - fluid ounces (fl oz) 
 - `edibles` - milligrams (mg) 
 - `immature-plant` - plants (i.e. # of plants)

When the category's `cannabisType` is set to `none`, you do not need to send a value. For all other types, the values must be greater than 0.

upc.description: A UPC code for this option

get.description: Fetch all of the product tags for an organziation

description.description: The description of the tag

productIds.description: An array of IDs that will correspond to the `id` property of each product from the [Retrieve Menu](/endpoints/menu/list-menu) endpoint. This value can be `null` if it does not have any products associated with it.

data.name: Top shelf
data.description: Only the dankest nugs get this designation

put.description: Update UPC fields for product options

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product these options belong to

options.description: Array of product options to update

id.description: The ID from the [menu api response](/endpoints/menu/list-menu) `data[].options[].id`

upc.description: The new UPC for this option

options.description: The options for this product. Please note that all options will be returned, not just the ones you submitted.

id.description: The product option ID

amount.description: The amount for this option

get.description: Retrieve all of the product categories for the organization.

id.description: The ID of the category

cannabisType.description:
The type of cannabis content all products in this category have. This is used to calculate purchase limits.

- `non-concentrated` - Used for flower. Cannabis content will be measured in grams (g) 
 - `concentrated` - Used for derived, concentrated products such as edibles or concentrates. Content measured in milligrams (mg) 
 - `mi-infused-solids` - Used for infused solids only in the state of Michigan. Content measured in ounces (oz) 
 - `mi-infused-fluids` - Used for infused fluids such as drinks only in the state of Michigan. Content measured in fluid ounces (oz) 
 - `edibles` - All edibles (used in New Jersey & Massachusetts). Content measured in milligrams (mg) 
 - `immature-plant` - Used for cannabis plants (i.e. clones). 
 - `none` - This category does not contain cannabis products.

get.description: Retrieve all of the product sub-categories for the organization.

id.description: The ID of the sub-category

message.example: A description of the error code

id.description: The id for the customer

hashId.description: An ID used to display to the customer and dispensary instead of the `id` number

firstName.description: The first name of the customer

lastName.description: The last name of the customer

joinedAt.description: The date the customer joined the dispensary

updatedAt.description: The date this customer was last updated

birthday.description: The birthday of the customer in `YYYY-MM-DD`

zip.description: The postal code of the customer

licenseExpiry.description: The expiration date of this customerâ€™s drivers license or `null` if it is not recorded.

marketingOptIn.description: Whether this customer is opted in to receive marketing

marketingOptInAt.description: When this customer opted in to marketing or `null`

customerGroups.description: An array of Strings for the names of the customer groups this customer is a part of (Example: Veterans, Seniors, etc.)

loyalty.description: Information about the loyalty of the customer

pointsAmount.description: The amount of loyalty points the customer has accrued

mostRecentAddress.description: The most recent address used for a delivery order or `null` if one does not exist

medicalExpiration.description: The expiration date of this customerâ€™s medical recommendation or `null` if they are an adult use customer

id.description: The id for the customer group

description.description: The description of the group

createdAt.description: The date this group was created

updatedAt.description: The date this group was last updated

id.description: The ID of the order

totalPrice.description: The subtotal price before discounts, credits, adjustments are taken into account.

netPrice.description: The final price of the order before payment & delivery fees. Includes taxes

customerGrandTotal.description: The final price of the order after all fees

createdAt.description: The datetime the order was created

packedAt.description: The datetime the order was packed on

fulfilledAt.description: The date the order was fulfilled

status.description:
The status of the order.

- `draft` is an order submitted without inventory taken out
- `new` is an order that has had inventory associated with it
- `packed` signifies an order has been processed and is waiting for pickup/delivery
- `fulfilled` is an order that has been fully completed
- `canceled` is an order that has been canceled

cancelationReason.description: A description of why the order was canceled

taxExempt.description: Whether this order was marked as tax exempt or not

refundTotal.description: The amount refunded by returns on this order

isMedical.description: Whether this order was for a medical customer or not

customerName.description: The name of the customer for express pickup or kiosk orders.

deliveryFee.description: The delivery fee for the order

deliveryFeeDescription.description: A description of the delivery fee that can be shown to the customer

lineItems.description: All of the products purchased with this order

id.description: The ID of this line item

quantity.description: The quantity of this line item

productId.description: The id of the product purchased

productName.description: The name of the product purchased

optionId.description: The id of the product option purchased

optionName.description: The name of the product option

optionPrice.description: The price of the product option at time of purchase

optionSalesPrice.description: The sales price of the product option at time of purchase if it was on sale

productBrandId.description: The brand id of the product

productBrand.description: The name of the brand of the product

unitPrice.description: The price per unit of this line item

subtotalPrice.description: The subtotal of this line item before discounts

finalPrice.description: The final price for this line item after all discounts

productMovingAverageCostPerUnit.description: The moving average cost per unit of the product

optionMovingAverageCostPerUnit.description: The moving average cost per unit of the product option

packageLineCost.description: The total cost for all metrc packages used to fulfill this line item

primaryCategory.description: The primary category for the product of this line item

id.description: The ID of this product category

name.description: The name of the primary category

discounts.description: An array of discounts applied to this line item (may be empty)

discountId.description: The ID for this discount. This value will be null for a custom discount added by a budtender

type.description: Either `flat` for a dollar amount or `percent` for a percent amount off

amount.description: The amount of the discount before being applied. Either in cents or a percent depending on the type.

amountUsed.description: The amount that was taken off of the line item by this discount, represented in cents

description.description: The description of the discount, which may be shown to the customer

fulfillAs.description: An array of objects showing what packages or product options fulfilled this order. Could also be `null` if the line item does not have any packages or substitutions associated with it.

pkg.description: An object about the compliance package for this fulfillment. Please handle both `null` and an empty object `{}` for times when there is not a package

unit.description: The metrc unit of this package

costPerUnit.description: The cost per unit of this package

optionSum.description: A negative number showing how much quantity of the underlying product option was used for this fulfillment. For `option` tracking this will be an integer, but for `product` tracking it could be a decimal.

productOptionId.description: The ID of the product option used for this fulfillment. For most cases, it will be the same as `lineItems[].optionId`, but in cases where another option is substituted to fulfill another (Example: 2 eighths fulfilling a quarter option), this `productOptionId` could be different.

quantityFulfilled.description: The quantity of the underlying `lineItem` that this fulfillment is responsible for

payments.description: All of the payments applied to this order

id.description: The ID of this payment

paymentTypeId.description: The ID of the payment type used for this payment

amount.description: The amount of the payment before fees in cents

finalAmount.description: The final amount of the payment after fees are included

name.description: The name of the payment type being used to make this payment

fee.description: The amount of a flat fee in cents added to this payment

feePercent.description: The % fee that this payment type has for all payments

feeAmount.description: The fee in cents the customer is paying. This is the flat `fee` + the `feePercent` multiplied by the payment amount.

feeDescription.description: The description of the fee that was shown to the customer.

customer.description: The customer attached to this order. Will be an empty object `{}` if there is no customer associated with this order (i.e. it is an anonymous order)

id.description: The ID of the customer

firstName.description: The first name of the customer

lastName.description: The last name of the customer

hashId.description: An ID used to display to the customer and dispensary instead of the `id` number

zip.description: The postal code for the customer

licenseExpiry.description: The expiration date of this customerâ€™s drivers license or `null` if it is not recorded.

medicalExpiration.description: The expiration date of this customerâ€™s medical recommendation or `null` if they are an adult use customer

placedBy.description: The employee that created this order. Will be an empty object `{}` if this order was created by a customer and not an employee.

id.description: The ID of the employee who created this order

firstName.description: The first name of the employee

lastName.description: The last name of the employee

fulfilledBy.description: The employee that fulfilled this order. Will be an empty object `{}` if there is no employee that fulfilled it.

id.description: The ID of the employee who fulfilled this order

firstName.description: The first name of the employee

lastName.description: The last name of the employee

adjustments.description: Adjustments either made automatically such as even dollar rounding or custom adjustments by an employee

amount.description: The amount of the adjustment in cents. May be either negative or positive.

description.description: A description for the adjustment

isTaxExemption.description: Set to `true` if this adjustment was automatically added to offset taxes that were included in the price of a product when a customer is tax exempt

taxid.description: The ID of the tax exempted or `null`

creditId.description: The ID for the credit applied

amountUsed.description: The credit amount applied to the order in cents

description.description: A description of the credit

discounts.description: The discounts applied to this order

discountId.description: The ID for this discount. This value will be null for a custom discount added by a budtender.

type.description: Either `flat` for a dollar amount or `percent` for a percent amount off

amount.description: The amount of the discount before being applied. Either in cents or a percent depending on the type.

amountUsed.description: The amount of the discount that was applied to the order represented in cents.

description.description: The description of the discount, which may be shown to the customer

loyaltyRedemptions.description: The loyalty redemptions used on this order

description.description: A description of the reward that was redeemed

pointsRequirement.description: The minimum number of loyalty points required to redeem this reward

pointsAmount.description: The amount of points used in this redemption

discountAmount.description: The discount amount of the reward. For `cash-back` this is the amount in cents per point used. For `flat` it is a flat amount in cents, `percent` would be a percent off

amountUsed.description: The amount of the discount applied to the order in cents

productOptionId.description: The product option id for a `free-product` redemption

taxes.description: The taxes applied to this order

amount.description: The amount applied to the order in cents

description.description: A description of the tax

rate.description: A numeric value for the percentage of a tax

amountBeforeExemption.description: The amount of the tax as calculated before determining what was exempted in cents

amountExempted.description: The amount of the tax reduction due to an exemption in cents

included.description: Whether the amount of this tax was already included in the product of the line items

exemptable.description: Whether this tax is able to be exempted

tier.description: The order of tax compounding. Will be a value between 1 and 5 indicating the order the tax was applied. Each tier may have multiple taxes in it.

normalRate.description: The rate of this tax before it was overriden by an employee

returns.description: The returns applied to this order

address.description: The address if this order is a delivery order. Otherwise, `null`

id.description: The ID of this return

refundInitial.description: The initial refund before taxes, credits, adjustments, loyalty, and discounts

refundTotal.description: The final refund total of the return

creditsTotal.description: The amount of credits refunded from the order

discountsTotal.description: The amount of discounts refunded from the order

adjustmentAmount.description: A manual adjustment of the refund for this return

adjustmentDescription.description: A description for the adjustment if there is one

paymentTypeName.description: The name of the payment type this refund was processed as

loyaltyTotal.description: The amount of a loyalty redemption returned

voidedAt.description: The date that this return was voided or `null`. If there is a value here, it means the return was canceled and is no longer applicable

voidedReason.description: The reason this return was voided

createdAt.description: The date this return was created

lineItems.description: An array of line items for this return

orderLineItemId.description: The ID of the `lineItems[].id` that is being returned

quantity.description: The quantity of the order line item being returned

reason.description: A reason this line item is being returned

fulfillAs.description: Fulfillment information for the packages on this return. See `lineItems[].fulfillAs` for possible properties

taxes.description: An array of tax information about this return

amount.description: The amount of tax proportionally applied to this return

description.description: A description of the tax

refunded.description: A boolean of whether this tax was refunded to the customer or not

included.description: Whether this tax was included in the price of the products

exemptable.description: Whether this tax was exemptable or not

createdBy.description: The employee that created this return

id.description: The id of the employee who created this return

firstName.description: The first name of the employee

lastName.description: The last name of the employee

voidedBy.description: The employee that voided this return (or `{}` if it is not voided)

id.description: The id of the employee who voided this return

firstName.description: The first name of the employee

lastName.description: The last name of the employee

id.description: The id for the payment type

name.description: The name of the payment type

fee.description: The flat fee for using this payment type in cents

feeDescription.description: The description for the fee to show to the customer

method.description: The medium the payment type uses to collect payment

feePercent.description: The percentage fee for this payment type

createdAt.description: The date this payment type was created

id.description: The ID of the new product

description.description: The description of the product

isActive.description: Whether this product is shown on the menu. Client organizations must update this via Meadow.

isFeatured.description: Whether this product is shown as featured. Client organizations must update this via Meadow.

cannabisType.description: The cannabis type of the products in this category used for purchase order calculations.

subCategories.description: The names of all the sub-categories of this product (may be empty `[]`)

photos.description: Photo URLs submitted in the request

options.description: The purchaseable options for this product

id.description: The ID of this option

price.description: The price of this option in cents

salesPrice.description: The sales price of this option in cents

content.description: The cannabis content of this option

thcAmount.description: The total amount of THC present in this product

thcAmountEach.description: The amount of THC per each unit of the product (i.e. 10mg per pre-roll in a pack of 15 pre-rolls)

thcAmountRangeLow.description: The low value of a range if this product has a range of THC value.

thcAmountRangeHigh.description: The high value of a range if this product has a range of THC value.

thcUnit.description: The unit for the THC values submitted.

cbdAmount.description: The total amount of CBD present in this product

cbdAmountEach.description: The amount of CBD per each unit of the product (i.e. 10mg per pre-roll in a pack of 15 pre-rolls)

cbdAmountRangeLow.description: The low value of a range if this product has a range of CBD value.

cbdAmountRangeHigh.description: The high value of a range if this product has a range of CBD value.

cbdUnit.description: The unit for the CBD values submitted.

status.description: If `closed` no more edits can be made to this PO.

finalTotal.description: Total in cents for the PO

subtotal.description: Total in cents for the PO minus any shipping & handling

inventoryVendorId.description: The ID of the inventory vendor

lineItems.description: The line items of the purchase order

productOption.description: The product option for the line item.

firstName.description: The first name of the customer

lastName.description: The last name of the customer

hashId.description: An ID used to display to the customer and dispensary instead of the `id` number

birthday.description: The birthday of the customer in `YYYY-MM-DD` format
